name: SnowRunner
summary: Get ready for the next-generation off-road experience! Drive powerful vehicles and overcome extreme open environments to complete dozens of challenging missions solo or with up to 3 friends!
info:
• 开发: Saber Interactive
  • 发行: Focus Home Interactive
  • 别名: 雪地奔驰
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: PS4
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 游戏类型: SIM
  • 游玩人数: 1 - 4人
  • 发行日期: 2020年4月28日
  • 官方网站: https://snowrunner-thegame.com/
